titles.title: Estate Tax Reduction Act of 2000
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the unified credit against estate and gift taxes to the equivalent of $4,000,000.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/7/2000--Introduced. Estate Tax Reduction Act of 2000 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) increase the unified estate and gift tax credit to $4,000,000; and (2) index such amount for inflation.
